name: PreferenceKey
desc: A named value produced by a view.

items.name: static var defaultValue: Self.Value
items.desc: The default value of the preference.

items.name: associatedtype Value
items.desc: The type of value produced by this preference.

items.name: static func reduce(value: inout Self.Value, nextValue: () -> Self.Value)
items.desc: Combines a sequence of values by modifying the previously-accumulated value with the result of a closure that provides the next value.
